ratings.comment:
Pros:
- Teacher is passionate about the class
- Getting an A isn't going to be very hard if you want an A
Cons:
- For a 400 level class the material is disrespectfully basic
- Colossal amount of busy work

It can feel like she and her guest speakers think they are teaching children. Consistently the least valuable way I spend time each week.

She is genuinely one of the kindest and most passionate professors I have ever had. You can tell how much she loves her job and students with every interaction you have with her. It is easy to be engaged in her lectures and assignments. 100% recommend!!

One of the best professors I've ever had. She genuinely cares so much about her students and values their feedback. The main assignment is a group project over the semester. Literally just the kindest woman ever and genuinely wants to see everyone succeed.
I took her Captsone course and she was very supportive, nice and flexible. Would highly recommend.

Greatest professor I have had so far here. Especially in terms of the care and respect she has for her students. Prof. Wahl was extremely easy to get along with, making the class setting comfortable while teaching all required material effectively. I recommend Kim Wahl to anybody.
